website_summaries.verdict: This unique cast cover is the perfect shape for adults recovering from elbow or mid-arm injuries.
pros: Two-way seal allows for cover to be placed almost anywhere on arm
Easily pulls on and off with pain-free application
cons: Not the most watertight cast cover on the market, but customers appreciate the pain-free experience

customer_reviews.title: Works well, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to cover my picc line that I must wear for 6 weeks following my hip replacement revision. It's really important that I don't get my line wet. I wear this to shower. The plastic is very substantial and the fit is snug. The top and bottom cuffs are stretch material. I am a 6'1" man, 240 lbs and it slides over my bicep with a precise fit. The cuffs dry quickly after my shower and really does work to keep my arm dry. This product wold work well for most people except very obese.
customer_reviews.author: str8updave

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product worked out great for my family member who currently has a picc line for IV antibiotic infusions. The line was kept dry, safe, and in place with every use. As a medical professional this is a great idea for all patients, I would recommend it to anyone who is weary of taking a chance on using plastic wrap and tape! I’ve seen lines ripped out because of that. Give this product a try. I’m glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical of this actually working to keep my picc dry, but I couldn't be happier with it. It keeps it dry and is easy enough to slip on myself. It's SO much more cost efficent than buying tegaderm, aqua shields and all of the other products to wrap and waterproof my arm. I'm so glad I found this and that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PICC line shower cover
customer_reviews.text: I used this to keep my PICC line dry when showering. It worked very well, always keeping my arm dry. Both ends look very similar, but look closely and you’ll notice one end is slightly larger than the other which makes it quite comfortable on the arm. Instructions do not advise to dry the black rubber ends before pulling off, but do this and it will last longer. Overall, a great purchase and i highly recommend it to those with IVs or casts.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Shower use with a Pic Line
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this for over a month now and is very happy with it. Great Quality and easy to put over his pic line. He can put it on and remove it by himself with ease. So far waterproofing has been fine. Much easier to use for showers than wrapping the pic line with plastic wrap. great sellar and would highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: PlumberFrank

customer_reviews.title: Hands free cover! Has rubber in both ends!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this cover. I wanted one that had the rubber on both ends. Easy to use when taking a shower or bath.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Does the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Works great and reasonably priced! Used this to shower while infusing. Owner was very kind and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: A D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a PICC line!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I’m able to wash most of my arm around my PICC line. It goes on and comes off easy after a couple of times of getting used to it. I can scrunch it up so just my PICC line is covered. Everything stays dry inside (I take pretty quick showers- the recommended is less than 10 minutes). The price is reasonable. I plan to get another one when I get close to the 2 month mark so I’ll have a backup ready. I just wanted to add that they have great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Only solution for a shower with a pic line
customer_reviews.text: This protective cover for pic line users is fantastic. It is easy to slip on and the excellent seal lets NO water inside. I forget it is on when I am done until I try to put my shirt on :). It was reasonably priced and is a professional hospital grade medical device. Glad I found it !
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: This sleeve is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I used this sleeve to cover my picc line to shower. It is a little loose at the wrist but snug on the top of my arm. This is the best thing I have found to keep my picc line dry. As far as durability, I gave it all the stars, but I have only had it for a couple of showers. Make sure to measure your arm so you know what size to get. The hospital never gave me anything to use to keep my picc line dry. They did suggest using cling wrap which didn't work for me at all. If I wear this one out, I would definitely order another one !
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Check sizes the adults size isnt right it runs small
customer_reviews.text: I have a average sized arm and had a picc line in left bicep and with this adult sized protector it was cutting off my circulation and it was impossible to reach the Location needed to cover picc. I had to cut the neoprene to get high enough to protect it from my shower time. After cutting it worked perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Rites

customer_reviews.title: Confortable..but leaked
customer_reviews.text: The return was fast and easy , I wanted to take a shower and had to keep part of my arm dry due to a cream medicine i put on twice a day . I was real excited ,but am sorry there were water droplets from just a simple shower . So this is a good idea but needs fine tuning . This is a no . BTW i have fairly large muscualr arms and this was comfortable but still leaked .
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Arm cover is comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The cover is easy to put on (and quick); it has never failed to keep the PICC line and dressing dry. We had been given some Hydroseal dressings (that seal on with an adhesive strip), but they tear at and damage the skin. This works with no tape, no adhesive. It also bends easily at the elbow, no restriction of motion.
customer_reviews.author: kyacker

customer_reviews.title: Kind of worked
customer_reviews.text: Arm still would get a little wet even with this on. The elastic part didnt seem all that waterproof. Not sure I'd really recommend this but I am also not convinced there are any better options. If you are having to use a PICC line you're probably not having the best time of your life. This not working can't make it that much worse. But maybe look for an alternative if you can find one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in theory because it does keep water off that part of your arm. However, it is very difficult to put on and take off by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps PICC line area bone dry in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the adult "average" size. I am 5' and the sizing is good. Most people are larger than me so I recommend a larger size for them. This sleeve keeps the entire dressing area for my PICC lines absolutely dry. I wouldn't try it in a pool or hot tub but for showering it works great. One tip is that the larger opening goes on your bicep and the smaller opening goes on your forearm. At first glance the openings appear to be the same in size but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I have a pic line in my arm and this works great. The original one started coming apart within the first week. I contacted the seller and he immediately sent me a new one that made a lot better. I’ve been using it for a week and I am satisfied with it and the seller was very responsive. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Keys you dry!!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product!! I have had countless surgeries and always worried about getting the incision wet. I tried a lot of products. Not always successful! Now I have a PICC line and wanted to be certain that i not get it wet at all! The keeps the important parts completely dry!! recommend this 100 percent. Be sure to read the directions on how to slide it over your PICC line or you will struggle like i did the first time! lol.
customer_reviews.author: C. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a PICC Line following an appendectomy gone wrong. I need to have the line for 3 months, and two weeks in I was super frustrated needing help every time I wanted to shower with someone Saran wrapping and taping my arm. My PICC Line is in a spot where it prevented me from bending my arm. In comes this miracle, the PICC Line shower cover. Immediately ordered it and fell in love. My PICC Line is dry and I’m so much more independent and can do things on my schedule. Easy to put on, stays dry, and is more or less pretty comfy! Thanks for the awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the ineffective stick-on shower shields I tried first. Perfect solution for the inner bicep PICC line I have. Gives me complete range of motion so I can clean my entire body easily, something I could not do with the shields. A little difficult to work it over the PICC line and very snug on my arm. I got the Middle size and it’s very tight, and I don’t have huge biceps by any means! Be sure to check their size suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. It fit and worked perfectly. I bought the extra large. The large would have been too small, and my bicep is 34cm
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R

customer_reviews.title: This PICC cover works!
customer_reviews.text: After doing what the doc said (wrapping arm in saran wrap -fun to do one handed!- and then with a plastic bag and taping it) my picc line dressing still got wet. This cover is tight, but comfortable, dries easily and removes witout disturbing your line. Excellent product. Highly recommended. Fast service also!
customer_reviews.author: Kris C Cal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but ripped
customer_reviews.text: This was the first PICC line cover I bought for a 6-week period. It was comfortable and easy to get on and off, but the silicone started to rip after only 2-3 weeks. Unfortunately with something like a PICC line, that's not a risk people are willing to take, so I ended up replacing this one with a name-brand PICC line cover that looked very similar but was more durable. I wish I'd spent the additional money upfront instead of having to buy multiple.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY recommend this product. There are lots of similar products out there, but this is by far the best, so look no further. It's easy to use and 100% reliable. NO water will get in there! The band that goes around the upper arm and lower arm is soft and flexible, so it stretches to the appropriate size and shields all water from getting in there. After use we simply stretch one of the arm bands around a hanger and hang it up in the bathroom and it's dry in a few hours. If you are using this you're probably going through some tough medical treatments, so wishing anyone reading this a healthy speedy recovery to health.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Dry Arm !
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for keeping a PICC line dry. I was having to tape plastic bags, which was not very effective. I looked around any found this product. It as been in use for several weeks now and it is still in great shape. For the cost it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this because I had a PICC line for eight weeks and needed to shower. Very easy to put on and take off. Kept the sight completely dry. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: GLENN LOWY

customer_reviews.title: PICC line protector for shower.
customer_reviews.text: This plastic cover really made a difference to showering with a PICC line. If you follow the directions exactly, it keeps lines & bandage dry while showering. I wouldn't immerse it is water (as in bathing), but it certainly works in the shower. They have lasted about 5 weeks for me. Others have reported about a month or less. I'm very careful rolling it back to put on or remove.
customer_reviews.author: fairdinkum

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Use This!
customer_reviews.text: So I have a port to allow medicine into my body from outside. The port CANNOT get wet. So how do I shower? With this excellent and ingenious product, I can shower without worrying about getting the port wet. I looked on Amazon for something that might work, and this device is a miracle!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Doloboff

customer_reviews.title: great product, fast service!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cover my PICC line in the shower. When I no longer need to use it, I am still going to use it for a plastic bag receptacle where I can pull out one bag at a time from one end. I ordered and got this product pretty fast. Great product, fast service! Would order anything from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Opening squeezes arm very tightly
customer_reviews.text: Husband used it only once to keep a picc line dry. He is a senior and his thin arms. After one use he said it was too painful to use again - the opening is tight, and even though his picc line stayed dry, the seals left deep indentations on his arms that were painful. He said he'd rather take the chance of leakage from saran wrap. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband came home on hospice with a PICC. Initially we were wrapping it with a plastics bag and rubber banding it. This is so much more comfortable and easy to use. He even used it at a water park recently. A little water got in at the water park, but I was still very impressed. It certainly keeps it dry in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Cray

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my father. A nurse told me to use Saran Wrap so I did both. My father likes the PICC cover much better! He keeps his line very dry and he can apply this cover in his own.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed a little too good to be true since everything I tried prior had always let in some water. NOT THIS PRODUCT. it works wonders. I have a PICC line in my upper arm and it works great. It seals extremely well on both ends. Took off after the shower and my dressing was bone dry. So worth it!! Only con is I suggest having someone to help you because it does take some maneuvering to get it on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5-Star great product recommended for anyone who needs to waterproof a picline.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with a wonderful support staff that will communicate directly with customers if needed. My arm is right between medium and large so I got the medium which was too small. I just ordered the large model. it works great. 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: kwadzana

customer_reviews.title: Works Well. A Few Tips:
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. Just a few tips: 1) Before you slide it up your arm, fold the neoprene to the outside of the sleeve. As if you're turning a cuff on pants. That keeps the sticky rubber away from your picc/arm. Then just slide the sleeve over the picc. Once positioned, unfold the neoprene so it's against your arm and it's sealed. When done showering, fold the cuff back again to remove. 2) One of the openings is larger than the other. Look closely. Obviously, the larger opening is for the top of the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Besmers

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Short n simple, it does not work. Bought this for my mom's picc line and it appeared to work at first, but as soon as we took it off we discovered that the whole bandage area was completely damp. It wasn't soping wet but water had completely saturated the area. Sad part was we kept the sleeve out of the direct stream of water, only runoff touched the sleeve and it still was completely useless. Don't waste you time or money. I would return it but I wasn't able to do that within the return time frame (emergencies popped up that prevented me from returning the item in time). Just plain doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra  Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Follow these instructions to prevent leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Buy the cover called Limbo! This is not quite as satisfactory as it is cheaper materials. ALWAYS squeeze out the air BEFORE going into the shower. I’ve used these covers for years and that is the key to preventing leaks. If you do not do this you will accidentally do it when you are in the shower and moving around. You’ll press on it unintentionally and as it releases the air it will allow water to enter. Trust me and take the air out first by squeezing the cover and making the air escape.
customer_reviews.author: edward r. lopez

customer_reviews.title: Rips easier than it should, and smell of rubber never goes away!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked for a very short time - the ends, which are supposed to provide the protection, ripped within the first month. Plus the rubber smell NEVER went away. Definitely do not recommend using this without something else underneath it (which seems to defeat it's purpose)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was our second time purchasing this product. If you are a cancer patient or had a PICC line installed, this is the product that you'll need to take showers. It save so much time and money over the waterproof sticker wraps. The nylon seal/band seems to be softer and more flexible now (meaning you won't lose your circulation).
customer_reviews.author: 1nvest3d

customer_reviews.title: Protective
customer_reviews.text: This line cover creates absolutely air tight arm protection during showers. Over six weeks, I don't think a single drop of water got inside it. However, it was quite difficult to get on and off and sometime cuts off circulation a bit, but that seems like a tradeoff for airtightness that can't be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my line dry
customer_reviews.text: This product works well to keep my line dry. It’s nice to not have to worry about getting it wet when I get a shower. It’s enough to just have a PICC line in so to be able to count on a product to keep it dry is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for the pic line!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for my mother who has a pic line. She is able to comfortably shower with no problems! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: mnwankpah

customer_reviews.title: Only one issue...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for what it is needed for. The PICC Line stays clean and dry. However, that being said... My mother lives alone and cannot put this on her arm using only one hand. Please keep in mind when ordering that this is a "two-person" product. It does what it says it does, it just need a little extra assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made showering much easier during treatment
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver when I had my PICC line in. I did have to have help getting it on. I socked a star bc it wasn't quite as effective for the full 6 weeks of my antibiotic treatment, but it was still better that plastic wrap, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: It works in calf wounds if you measure and no water gets it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my calf where I had surgery. I ordered the extra large! It’s perfect love that it doesn’t cover my foot only surgical area! Was worried about size but I measured my ankle& below my knee and extra large was good
customer_reviews.author: Car 14

customer_reviews.title: Product works great. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought the PICC line protector for my husband who has a PICC in his arm due to receiving antibiotics three times a day via PICC. He has had the PICC line 5 months of writing this review and uses the the protector daily to shower. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs to protect a PICC line or midline during treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: My brother can take regular showers...woohoo!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pic line for my brother who was diagnosed with lung cancer. When they installed the PICC line, he was trying to find ways to cover the area. I researched Amazon, found this product and read the reviews. I ordered it and had it delivered to my brother. When he used it, he called me to tell me that he was happy that he was able to take a “regular” shower. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LMOE

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve worked perfectly. Having to live with a PICC line is a huge pain but this product made one of the more difficult parts of it, namely keeping the picc line and dressing dry while showering, much more easy. I found it kept that part of my arm dry in the shower, and was easy to put on and remove by myself. I am very happy with this product and will buy another if/when it gets worn. Thanks for offering. It makes life living with this thing way easier!
customer_reviews.author: J Rieman

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying!!
customer_reviews.text: Important addition to living with an arm that can’t get wet. Needs 2 people to pull it on and remove it without further injuring the arm. I used tape on both ends to ensure the arm stayed dry. I think the item is expensive; but useful.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your stitches or cast dry
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Easy to put on and take off. Can use multiple x’s and not just for the cast but other surgeries on the lower legs or arms that need that coverage .delivery and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great protector
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the water off the picc line well. I don't like that you sweat in the cover so you have to take quick showers and remove quickly after you finish. It is easy to put on by yourself but easier with help.
customer_reviews.author: Sandld

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent shower cap for the price, it did fit a little snug I'd suggest buying a size up, but overall it worked just fine. No water was able to get in and happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G!

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works very well. Now you don’t submerge your arm in water, but it really avoids about 95% of water getting in..The nurses were amazed to see one and will recommend to other patients
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Delfin

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Sent the wrong size and when I got one in the right size, it was impossible to get past the bandages without ruining them and didn't keep the area dry in the shower anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: PICC Line cover exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This PICC line cover was exactly as advertised, the measurements were accurate and the video that they link to is very helpful to attempt to put on my arm. I said attempt as I was not able to get it on due to the way my PICC is placed makes it uncomfortable for me to pull the cover over the PICC. I can see how well it would work, and I wish it had been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Delgado

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!!  TOO TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like at all. Too tight. Hurt. Now. If you are a bigger person be careful. I believe it caused blood clot. I thought I was being smart and independent. Now I'm on eliquis for a large blood clot. Go with press and seal wrap and a couple of gentle rubberbands on each end.
customer_reviews.author: debra maradiaga

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth getting
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cover for my super skinny arm. This one worked well. I never got any water on my picc dressing since it provided such a good seal. It saved me so much energy from not having to wrap up my arm with plastic wrap and tape.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I had a PICC line in my upper for intravenous antibiotics treatment. This product made taking a shower so much easier convenient. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TEHK48

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!  Swim and shower with no worries!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Air and water tight!! Made showering and swimming possible for my husband who had IV meds for 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so much easier to use than Saran Wrap, which was the suggestion at the hospital. Completely waterproof In the shower. I’ve used for over a year, this is my second one, the vinyl was Getting stiff on my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: PICC Line Protector
customer_reviews.text: This item keeps PICC line dry while showering or bathing. It does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 30 days
customer_reviews.text: The neoprene at each end would start to tear within two or three weeks, and once it has a tiny tear, the tear will get worse with each use due to stretching the neoprene over the arm. Amazon replaced mine after about a month because it did not last very long, but the second one did the same thing. This product is better than using the free plastic covers supplied by home infusion companies or hospitals, but for the cost, it should be more reliable and last longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my wife's PICC line dry and is more effective than several other approaches we tried. It is easier to use with two people. One holds the cuff open while the one with the PICC line slides their arm through.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: 🥺❤️I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got a pickline because my port is not working and I’m no longer a good candidate for my port but this is amazing. It has helped me take a shower freely and water doesn’t get in it. It has kept my pickline free from water ❤️ I’m glad I ordered this before quarantine. It’s very durable and it has changed my life and I’m actually happier that I have a pickline versus my port. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla c:

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom after she was discharged from the hospital. Was a life saver for her. Not sure if it would keep it totally dry on its own but this with a little press n seal Saran Wrap kept it bone dry :)
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. At first, I wasn’t too sure if water would seep through it, so I wrapped some Saran plastic wrap around the Picc line first and then place the cover on top. After the shower, no water seeped through so after that all I use is the Picc line cover to shower. It’s stretchable and easy to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Cruz

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put on and stayed in place while I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver when I had a Picc line. It was easy to put on and stayed in place while I showered. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia D

customer_reviews.title: Works great just a hassle getting on.
customer_reviews.text: Kept water out during showers. Somewhat arduous getting on. The elastic band is very tight. Would have been better if band was velcro or zip. Just cumbersome to deal with the tight elastic band. Kept the arm dry. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: easily protects your wound area
customer_reviews.text: If you have a PIC line, you'll be needing this to shower. No help required to getting it on and in place.
customer_reviews.author: dan fugitt

customer_reviews.title: Great arm PICC line shower protector!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best arm picc line protector we've tried. Has never leaked once. Very easy to put on and take off. Makes taking showers so much faster, safer and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sheltie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s tight to put on and take off, it works great and didn’t stretch out. Worth the money. I don’t recommend the arm cover, it stretched out after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hottinger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to shower with no help for the three weeks he had his pic line in. It stayed dry and was easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.author: CSE 13

customer_reviews.title: Started splitting in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: After using this sleeve 5 times the black rubber part of the sleeve that seals on your arm started to split, it no longer keeps water out while taking a shower. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: James A Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything else I've found
customer_reviews.text: The shower cover has a great seal to keep water out. My only issue is that my arm is large above the elbow and it's a struggle to get it up and over my pic line. I make it happen but it's not easy
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This Picc line cover is top notch
customer_reviews.text: This device is a real life saver! I had a Picc line for 6 weeks and this made showering actually very easy. The middle is very fleixble so you can bend and move around as needed. The ends seal very well and keep the water out if you follow the directions. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, but not for long! Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality. Don’t buy this if you need something to use regularly and last. It worked for a short period of time before starting to leak around the black neoprene edges, endangering my PICC line, and becoming useless. It was only used very gently for quick showers 1-2 times a week and barely lasted 3 months. Put your money towards a brand with better quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not all that universal
customer_reviews.text: not useful with really large upper arm cuts in and painful not useful
customer_reviews.author: Redjohn

customer_reviews.title: Keeping PICC line dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She had Hyperemesis Gravadarum. She said that protector was amazing!!! It went on comfortably, was snug, and protected her PICC line from getting wet. This protector is highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Terri J.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that it kept the arm dry and it was a snug fit on both ends. What you do have to keep in mind and I have noticed is that you should use the same side on the arm each time and the same side on the wrist each time because the side of the upper arm did stretch out since it is bigger than your lower arm. It definitely kept everything really dry. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Valladares

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - provides a tight seal with the soft black rings on either end. The box had a picture of a mitten- type product however, the seller LuckyBuy11 was very responsive and helpful in clarifying this.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for over 2 weeks now and it has kept my PICC completely dry. A previous review mentioned difficulty putting on- solution is to roll up rubber seal, slide on, and roll back down. No need for extra set of hands-big plus! 😁 Absolutely love this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S-Suarez.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve worked better than expected. It is very tight and kept my picc area dry. The only reason I gave it a 4 was because after about 6 weeks, the black neoprene ends started getting tears. Still well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and I would recommend to anyone using a pic line. Works perfect with very little effort putting on.
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Mcvay

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this product due to the the grip shredding. My arm is not that big and it keeps ripping more and more. Having a Picc line it is very important to keep it dry and this product is not the one to do that.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to take IV anabiotic’s and this worked great to protect the IV from getting wet. It was simple to use and the price was great. I was struggling to find something to help me shower and this work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sherron Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof(ish)
customer_reviews.text: When new absolutely no problems but after 2-3 weeks the quality of the foam becomes obvious. It doesn’t take long for wear and tear and ceases to become waterproof and water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its marketing
customer_reviews.text: If you must cover a wound or IV to shower this is the ticket. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: Durable and waterproof. Must order right dize.
customer_reviews.text: Been using since early March for showers because I have a PICC line in arm. It's a little difficult to get on/off with one hand but thank God I had hubby to help. Worked great though. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a really helpful product.. you can take shower freely !!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this Picc line protector.. It is something which helps me protect it form getting wet when I take shower .. It is really tight form both the ends and avoids water from getting in. It is really a great product Maggie. I am grateful to you.. so thoughtful of you to come up with such a wonderful idea. :)
customer_reviews.author: Saili

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality neoprene.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered at the end of November 2018. I shower with it twice a week and it has developed cracks in the neoprene at both ends. I don't know how long this product is supposed to last, but I would have thought more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: R. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister to cover her PICC line. She’s going through leukemia treatments and they were taping her arm everyday for the shower. She said this works amazing and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Humbills.homeonwheels

customer_reviews.title: It really protects your hand
customer_reviews.text: I have pick line, and this really protects me when I shower. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Rafael J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this product when he had a PICC line put in. It was a showering lifesaver. Navigating the water was not an issue with this on! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant arm coverage
customer_reviews.text: I had to come home from an open heart surgery with a picc line inserted for IV home infusion. This cover allowed me to shower without fear of the shower water compromising that line. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size a little snug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter, it was kinda hard to use cause it came a little snuggled than expected and it didn’t stretch as much. The quality was good but maybe next time I would order a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Perez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps most the water out.
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well. My wife still got some water in the cover but overall it did the job well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product did what it was designed to do. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: It is very tight but I needed that type of closure. I had a PICC line and if was very comforting I could shower safely
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: We were wasting plastic wrap and tape and lots of time to cover a pic line. This changed our lives. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as described
customer_reviews.text: Sweats inside and you'll think it leaked... But it doesn't... Keeps covered area clean and dry as described
customer_reviews.author: Janey Rice

product_meta.title: PICC Line Protector Arm Cast Cover for Shower Adult, Waterproof TPU Shower Bandage and Cast Protector for Chemotherapy Shower and Bath Watertight Protection Reusable
product_meta.description:
Size:1.04 Foot (Pack of 1)This Medium size might be small for some people, thus, we have provide Large size for you to choose. Please take reference to the size information we provided. 

Size Chart:
Upper Arm Circumference 9.4" to 11.4" (24 to 29 cm)

Item stretch size: 14(L) x 8(W) inch 

Medical Grade Waterproof TPU PICC line Shower Cover:
1. Different with other odor and airtight shower cover, this upgraded PICC Line shower protector uses comfortable and breathable TPU material, taste less and reusable, which can be completely submerged by water.

2.The liner uses waterproof sealing material which can prevent the penetration of water to plaster PICC Line and bandages on arms during bathing. Soft and comfortable opening allows to adjust the shower cover easily and will not restrict the blood flow. 

3.Elastic opening can reduce dragging on PICC line or bandages when fitting and removing 

4. Breathable material, no oppressed and stuffy feeling to your arm. Provide you a pleasing shower experience. 

5.Easy to use and will last through the users duration of treatment. Recommended for adult patients over 5 feet tall.

Please Notice:

PICC Line cover for indoor use only. We don't recommend swim or sit in a bath tub with this PICC line arm shower cover take on.

In order to maintain product life, please dry the shower cover with cloth.

Please keep your shower time within 20 minutes.
feature_bullets: For adult upper arm circumference: 9.4" to 11.4" (24 to 29 cm). Medical grade TPU waterproof material. Moisture protection, FSA eligible. Keep PICC Line and bandage dry. Odorless and tasteless, latex-free. Safe for use.
Tough and durable PICC line shower cover. Made of high quality PVC and TPU, neoprene rubber. Light, hygiene, washable material which is non slippery and will not stick to your arm.
Waterproof PICC Cover. High elastic opening makes it easily pull on and off in a non-painful way. Keep arm blood circulation normal.
Adult PICC Line shower protector with self-sealing protection. Soft and comfortable, no tightness and stuffy feeling.Please read the size chart carefully before order.
Best for chemotherapy showering, bathing. Especially for people who is recovering from chemotherapy treatment, surgeries, skin problems.
